response: *Harold Crofton Sleigh - Founder of H.C.Sleigh Shipping Company, & Golden Fleece Petroleum Company, Melbourne,  Australia.
Harold Crofton Sleigh ( 1867-1933 ) a wealthy Australian businessman ( founder of "Golden Fleece" ) was born here.
Also Harold Crofton Sleigh the founder of H.C.Sleigh Shipping Company & Golden Fleece Petroleum Company, Melbourne, Australia,  lived in Belmont House with his parents, in 1881.

Golden Fleece was an Australian brand of petroleum products and service stations operated by H. C. Sleigh and Company. A partnership was founded in Melbourne, Australia in 1893 by shipowner and merchant Harold Crofton Sleigh (1867–1933) and manufacturer and shipowner John McIlwraith (1828–1902). In 1913 the company took delivery of its first consignment of motor spirit from the United States and marketed it in Australia as "Golden Fleece".Petrol and Oil Company Timeline, Unique Cars and Parts.
